description: Validates the integrity of an assessment report in Audit Manager.

parameters.name: s3RelativePath
parameters.description: The relative path of the Amazon S3 bucket that the assessment report is stored in.

nested_items.name: signatureValid
nested_items.description: Specifies whether the signature key is valid.

nested_items.name: signatureAlgorithm
nested_items.description: The signature algorithm that's used to code sign the assessment report file.

nested_items.name: signatureDateTime
nested_items.description: The date and time signature that specifies when the assessment report was created.

nested_items.name: signatureKeyId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier for the validation signature key.

nested_items.name: validationErrors
nested_items.description: Represents any errors that occurred when validating the assessment report.
